General.Name: Mega Perintis Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Mega Perintis Tbk engages in the manufacture of men's apparel in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Clothing and Accessories. The company is also involved in the retail of shoes, clothing; accessories, including shoes, sandals, bags, wallets, hats, belts, and perfumes; and sports equipment. It offers products under the Manzone, EDWIN, MOC, men's top, minimal, Nike, adidas, PUMA, DUE/E, SALE ZONE, and LEVI'S brands. The company sells its products through its own stores or outlets, department stores or counters in stores, smart phone applications, and third-party online portals, as well as through its website. PT Mega Perintis Tbk was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: JL. Karet Pedurenan No. 240, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12940
